title: Is it possible to transfer to Garena server?
body: There is a possibility that I will move to Taiwan this year. On my current EUNE account I've poured money, heart and sweat into it. So it'd be great if I could transfer my account to Garena in Taiwan. If that is not possible, is it possible to transfer my mainland Tencent account to Garena?

replies.body: Sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but at the moment it's not possible :(  There have been transfer windows to Garena servers in the past, but usually these sort of transfer windows accompany the launch of new regions.  Don't really know what Tencent's policy for account transfers to Garena are, but as they're also different companies I would say it's unlikely they would have these transfers as well.
I love this game, but the ping for us south asian is around 150+ will riot make it easier for us in near future, if not we would like to transfer our accounts to garena if that is possible ofcourse
